name: amines, bis(hydrogenated tallow alkyl) oxidised
Restrictions: Not to be used for articles in contact with fatty foods for which simulant D1 and/or D2 is laid down.Only to be used in: (a)polyolefins at 0,1 % (w/w) concentration and in(b)PET at 0,25 % (w/w) concentration.
NotesCompliance: V1 Verification of compliance by residual content per food contact surface area (QMA) pending the availability of an analytical method.
